Block * block [11][20]

Detailed Description

levelThree.cpp

Creates the design for the second level. Uses the polymorphism feature of the block.cpp class and randomly generates blocks of different colors and places them in a pre-defined layout.

Author: Natraj Subramanian

Definition at line 17 of file levelThree.h.
